title: Version 1.0.0 Released
text: We've introduced several new features and improvements. Check out what's new in the latest version!

title: Version 1.1.0 Update
text: Minor bug fixes and performance enhancements. Please update to the latest version for a smoother experience.

title: Version 2.0.0 Major Update
text: Our biggest update yet! Explore the new UI, added features, and enhanced user experience.
